price: 14.Tokkel kaa dirabboyseeniih, tet yusguudeeniih, ken Rabbi digaalá ken duuduseh alifii keenil hee ken dambih, Woo digaalá keenil massoyseh.(num keenik ma- raaqinna woo digaalák).
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu faʿaqarūhā fadamdama ʿalayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā
